verses.arabic: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.english: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da iskõki mãsu shẽkar abũbuwa, shẽƙẽwa.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
verses.english: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan da girãgizai mãsu ɗaukar nauyi (na ruwa).

verses.arabic: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
verses.english: And those [ships] sailing with ease
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan da jirãge mãsu gudãna (a kan ruwa) da sauƙi.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.english: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan da Malã'iku mãsu rabon al'amari (bisa umurnin Allah).

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.english: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
verses.hausa: Lalle abin da ake yi muku alkawari (da zuwansa), haƙĩƙa gaskiya ne.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.english: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle sakamako (ga ayyukanku), haƙĩƙa, mai aukuwa ne

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
verses.english: By the heaven containing pathways,
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da samã ma'abũciyar hanyõyi (na tafiyar taurãri da sautin rediyo).

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.english: Indeed, you are in differing speech.
verses.hausa: Lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa, kunã cikin magana mai sãɓa wa juna (game da Alƙur'ani).

verses.arabic: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.english: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.
verses.hausa: Anã karkatar da wanda aka jũyar (daga gaskiya).

verses.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.english: Destroyed are the falsifiers
verses.hausa: An la'ani mãsu ƙiri-faɗi.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.english: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke shagala a cikin zurfin jãhilci.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.english: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"
verses.hausa: Sunã tambaya: "Yaushe ne rãnar sakamako zã ta auku?"

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.english: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire
verses.hausa: Ranar da suke a kan wuta anã fitinar su.

verses.arabic: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.english: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
verses.hausa: (A ce musu): "Ku ɗanɗani fitinarku, wannan shĩ ne abin da kuka kasance kunã nẽman zuwansa da gaggãwa."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,
verses.hausa: Lalle mãsu taƙawa, sunã a cikin lambunan itãce da marẽmari.

verses.arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.english: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.
verses.hausa: Sunã mãsu dĩbar abin da Ubangijinsu Ya bã su. Lalle sũ, sun kasance mãsu kyautatãwa a gabãnin haka (a dũniya).

verses.arabic: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.english: They used to sleep but little of the night,
verses.hausa: Sun kasance a lõkaci kaɗan na dare suke yin barci.

verses.arabic: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.english: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkutan asuba sunã ta yin istigfãri.

verses.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.english: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.
verses.hausa: Kuma a cikin dũkiyarsu akwai hakki ga (matalauci) mai rõƙo da wanda aka hana wa rõƙo.

verses.arabic: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.english: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]
verses.hausa: Kuma a cikin ƙasã akwai ãyõyi ga mãsu yaƙĩni.

verses.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?
verses.hausa: Kuma a cikin rãyukanku (akwai ãyõyi). To, bã zã ku dũbã ba?

verses.arabic: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
verses.hausa: Kuma a cikin sama arzikinku (yake fitõwa) da abin da ake yi muku alkawari.

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.english: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.
verses.hausa: To, kuma Ina rantsuwa da Ubangijin sama da ƙasã, lalle shĩ (abin da ake yi muku alkawari), haƙĩƙa gaskiya ne, kamar abin da kuka zamo kunã karantãwa na magana,

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.english: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -
verses.hausa: Shin, lãbãrin Bãƙin Ibrãhĩm, waɗanda aka girmama, ya zo maka?

verses.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.english: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da suka shiga gare shi, sai suka yi sallama; ya ce "Aminci ya tabbata a gare ku, mutãne bãƙi!"

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.english: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
verses.hausa: Sai ya jũya zuwa ga iyãlinsa, sa'an nan ya zo da maraƙi tutturna,

verses.arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.english: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
verses.hausa: Sai ya kusantar da shi zuwa gare su, ya ce: "Bã zã ku ci ba?"

verses.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.english: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.
verses.hausa: Sai ya ji tsõro daga gare su. Suka ce: "Kada kaji tsõro." Kuma suka yi masa bushãra da (haihuwar) wani yaro mai ilmi.

verses.arabic: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.english: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"
verses.hausa: Sai matarsa ta fuskanta cikin ƙyallõwa, har ta mari fuskarta kuma ta ce: "Tsõhuwa bakarãriya (zã ta haihu)!"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Kamar haka Ubangijinki Ya faɗa. Lalle Shĩ, Shĩ ne Mai hikima, Mai ilmi."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.english: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
verses.hausa: (Ibrãĩm) ya ce: "To mẽne ne babban al'almarinku, yã kũ Manzanni!"

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle mũ, an aike mu zuwa ga waɗansu mutãne, mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.english: To send down upon them stones of clay,
verses.hausa: "Dõmin mu saka musu waɗansu duwãtsu na wani yumɓu (bom).

verses.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.english: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."
verses.hausa: "Waɗanda aka yi wa alãma daga wajen Ubangijinka, dõmin mãsu ɓarna."

verses.arabic: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
verses.hausa: Sa'an, nan Muka fitar da wanda ya kasance a cikinta daga mũminai.

verses.arabic: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.english: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.
verses.hausa: Sai dai ba mu sãmu ba, a cikinta, fãce gida guda na Musulmi.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.english: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bar wata ãyã, a cikinta, ga waɗanda ke jin tsõron azãba, mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Mũsã, a lõkacin da Muka aiko shi zuwa ga Fir'auna da wani dalĩli bayyananne.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.english: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."
verses.hausa: Sai ya jũya bãya tãre da ƙarfinsa, kuma ya ce: "Mai sihiri ne kõ kuwa mahaukaci!"

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.english: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, Muka kama shi tãre da rundunarsa, sa'an nan Muka jẽfa su a cikin tẽku, alhãli kuwa yanã wanda ake zargi.

verses.arabic: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
verses.english: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Ãdãwa, a lõkacin da Muka aika iska ƙẽƙasasshiya a kansu.

verses.arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.english: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.
verses.hausa: Bã ta barin kõme da ta jẽ a kansa, fãce ta mayar da shi kamar rududdugaggun ƙasũsuwa.

verses.arabic: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.english: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Samũdãwa, a lõkacin da aka ce musu: "Ku ji ɗan dãɗi har wani ɗan lõkaci,"

verses.arabic: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.english: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.
verses.hausa: Sai suka yi girman kai ga umurnin Ubangijinsu, sabõda haka tsãwa ta kãma su, alhãli kuwa sunã kallo.

verses.arabic: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.english: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
verses.hausa: Ba su kõ sãmu dãmar tsayãwa ba, kuma ba su kasance mãsu nẽman ãgaji ba.

verses.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.english: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
verses.hausa: Da mutãnen Nũhu a gabãnin haka, lalle sun kasance waɗansu irin mutãne ne fãsiƙai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.english: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
verses.hausa: Kuma sama, mun gina ta da wani irin ƙarfi, alhãli kuwa lalle Mũ ne Mãsu yalwatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.english: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
verses.hausa: Kuma ƙasã Mun shimfiɗa ta, To, madalla da mãsu shimfiɗãwa, Mũ,

verses.arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.
verses.hausa: Kuma daga kõme Mun halitta nau'i biyu, watakila zã ku yi tunãni.

verses.arabic: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka ku gudu zuwa ga Allah, lalle nĩ mai gargaɗi kawai ne a gare ku, mai bayyanannen gargaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
verses.hausa: Kuma kada ku sanya, tãre da Allah wani abin bautãwa na dabam, lalle nĩ, mai gargaɗi kawai ne a gare ku, mai bayyanannen gargaɗi.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.english: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."
verses.hausa: Kamar haka dai wani Manzo bai jẽ wa waɗanda ke gabãninsu ba fãce sun ce: "Mai sihiri ne kõ mahaukaci."

verses.arabic: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.english: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.
verses.hausa: shin, sunã yi wa jũna wasiyya da shi ne? Ã'a, sũ dai mutãne ne mãsu girman kai.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.english: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.
verses.hausa: Sai ka jũya daga barinsu, kuma kai ba abin zargi ba ne.

verses.arabic: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka tunãtar, dõmin tunãtarwa tanã amfãnin mũminai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.english: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ban halitta aljannu da mutãne ba sai dõmin su bauta Mini.

verses.arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.english: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.
verses.hausa: Bã Ni nufln (sãmun) wani arziki daga gare su, Bã Ni nufin su (yi Mini hidimar) ciyar da Ni.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
verses.english: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.
verses.hausa: Lalle Allah, Shĩ ne Mai azurtãwa, Mai ĩkon yi, Mai cikakken ƙarfi.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.english: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.
verses.hausa: To, lalle waɗanda suka yi zãlunci sunã da masaki (na ɗĩban zunubi) kamar masakin abõkansu, sabõda haka kada su yi Mini gaggãwa.

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, bone ya tabbata ga waɗanda suka kãfirta, daga rãnar su wadda aka yi musu alkawari.
